author: .fjl
content: hi guys, just a quick heads-up: I have updated the rpc-compat tests for devnet-6 spec compliance (new system call addresses, etc.)

author: .fjl
content: Also have added some more tests for `eth_getBlockByNumber` with block requests at block heights with different forks. This is supposed to check for client errors where fields from a future fork are returned before the fork activates.
